page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF FIONA
page.content: The rain was pouring down outside. "Typical English weather!"I thought as I pulled myself yawning out of bed. After breakfast, Weetabix, toast & tea, Dad dropped me off at school in the car. I ran into school getting soaking wet.After doing 8 a day our group did computer Maths. When we had wandered round the cold, wet playground we wrote a poem about the months, before we marked our 8 a day.At Dinnertime we had beefburgers, chips & baked beans, followed by cheesecake.After Dinner I did a collage.We went to Y.O.C. after school and painted some birds.Kate, Francesca,Charlotte and I went to Brighouse Light Opera Juniors to practise for our show.In the evening we played Rounders at Guides.
